articles.title: The science behind the Fukushima waste water release - BBC
articles.description: The BBC takes a look at the science behind the controversial water release.
articles.content:
Japan has begun releasing treated radioactive water from its damaged Fukushima power plant into the Pacific Ocean - 12 years after a nuclear meltdown.
That's despite China slapping a ban on Japanese… [+6176 chars]

articles.author: Benjamin Parkin, Peggy Hollinger
articles.title: The new contest to land on the Moon - Financial Times
articles.description: India’s successful landing is the latest manifestation of renewed interest in lunar exploration, driven both by national pride and strategic considerations
articles.content: A roar of triumph swept across mission control in Bengaluru as Chandrayaan-3s lander gently touched the lunar surface on Wednesday. India is on the Moon, said a smiling and obviously relieved S Soman… [+10521 chars]
